car.orientor.util
Class ObjOut

java.lang.Object
  car.orientor.util.ObjOut

public abstract class ObjOut
extends java.lang.Object

This class supplies methods that can write ObjWireFrames out to files. This package is not compiled into JavaScript, so this class can use the entire java.io package.

Author:
Joshua Little

Method Detail

printObjFile

public static void printObjFile(ObjWireFrame obj,
                                java.io.OutputStream out)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Writes the supplied ObjWireFrame out to the output stream as a valid .obj file.

Parameters:
obj - the ObjWireFrame to write out.
out - the output stream to write the ObjWireFrame to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the OutputStream throws an IOException.
